PushTargets.description: List of targets that can be pushed to. The array keys are the target names, and the values are the target urls (path to api.php without the '/api.php' part). Example: $egPushTargets['English Wikipedia'] = 'http://en.wikipedia.org/w';

PushShowTab.description: Show the push action as a tab (if not, it's displayed in the actions dropdown). This only works for skins with an actions dropdown. For others push will always appear as a tab.

PushIncTemplates.description: You can choose to include templates when pushing a page.

PushIncFiles.description: You can choose to push files used in a page.

PushAllowLogin.description: Indicate if login options should be added to the push interface or not.

PushLoginUser.description: Default login data. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

PushLoginPass.description: Default login data. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

PushLoginDomain.description: Default login data. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

PushLoginUsers.description: Default login data per target. Overrides $egPushLoginUser and $egPushLoginPass when specified. Array keys should be the urls assigned in the $egPushTargets array. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

PushLoginPasswords.description: Default login data per target. Overrides $egPushLoginUser and $egPushLoginPass when specified. Array keys should be the urls assigned in the $egPushTargets array. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

PushLoginDomains.description: Default login data per target. Overrides $egPushLoginUser and $egPushLoginPass when specified. Array keys should be the urls assigned in the $egPushTargets array. When set, the values will always be used when there is no login interface. If there is, they will be filled in as default.

PushBulkWorkers.description: The amount of push 'workers' (simultanious push requests) on Special:Push.

PushBatchSize.description: The maximum amount of targets to push a page to in one go.

PushDirectFileUploads.description: This is needed when pushing to a wiki that cannot access the source file (for example from a private wiki to a wiki on the internet).
